sentences.sentence: The value of India keep stable between 2010 and 2012; while Britain, China, Japan and Dutch decrease greatly between 2010 and 2012.

sentences.sentence: The value of India keep stable between 2010 and 2012; while Britain, China, Japan and Dutch decrease greatly between 2010 and 2012.
